Getting & Cleaning Data - Course Project
========================================================

R Script : run_analysis.R 

Procedure
1.Load files in R.
2.Substitute the y_train and y_test with appropriate activity labels
3.Add Column names of x_test and x_train with features.
4.Merge subject_test, x_test and y_test
5.Merge subject_train, x_train and y_train
6. Use grep command to find mean and std dev columns from the data set and created a subset.
7.Merge the two datas set using rbind.
8.Use aggregate function to create final Data Set


Code Book :
Contains all the definations for the variables used in the data set.
